text: Valeriy Alekseyevich Dolinin (, 25 July 1953 – 15 November 2021) was a Soviet rower. He won silver medals at the 1980 Summer Olympics and 1982 World Rowing Championships. He was born in Leningrad, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Dolinin died on 15 November 2021 in Moscow, Russia at the age of 68.Памяти двукратного призера Олимпийских игр по академической гребле Валерия Алексеевича Долинина ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet rowers
title: Valeriy Dolinin
